snippet: The U. S. Mail steamship Ohio, Capt. SCHENCK, arrived at this port yesterday morning, from Chagrcs 24th September, and Kingston, 30th. The Ohio arrived off Sandy Hook at 1 o'clock, A. M., to-day, but could not procure a pilot: she finally succeede...
lead_paragraph: The U. S. Mail steamship Ohio, Capt. SCHENCK, arrived at this port yesterday morning, from Chagrcs 24th September, and Kingston, 30th. The Ohio arrived off Sandy Hook at 1 o'clock, A. M., to-day, but could not procure a pilot: she finally succeeded in obtaining the services of Capt. G. THOMAS, of the steamer Ajax, and reached her wharf at an early hour.

headline.main: FURTHER FROM CALIFORNIA.; ARRIVAL OF THE OHIO. $1,500,000 IN GOLD!! PARTICULARS OF THE LOSS OF THE LAFAYETTE.
